docs.text: Requirements S.NO Description Functionality 1 Tool shall provide the signup and login functionalities. Generic 2 Tool shall provide the option for the user to select either passport or adhar or voterid as part of the signup functionality. Signup 3 Tool shall provide the option for the user to select either passport or adhar or voterid as part of the login functionality. Login 4 Tool shall display the error message when invalid passport or adhar or voterid as part of the signup/login functionality. Error 5 Tool shall the have the options 'Home', 'Login', 'Signup', 'Others' and 'About' in the sidebar. Generic 6 Tool shall display the state, district, area and party values post login. Generic 7 Tool shall provide the user to select the party values based on the constituation. Generic
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: S.NO Description Functionality 1 Tool shall provide the signup and login functionalities. Generic 2 Tool shall provide the option for the user to select either passport or adhar or voterid as part of the signup functionality. Signup 3 Tool shall provide the option for the user to select either passport or adhar or voterid as part of the login functionality. Login 4 Tool shall display the error message when invalid passport or adhar or voterid as part of the signup/login functionality. Error 5 Tool shall the have the options 'Home', 'Login', 'Signup', 'Others' and 'About' in the sidebar. Generic 6 Tool shall display the state, district, area and party values post login. Generic 7 Tool shall provide the user to select the party values based on the constituation. Generic
